metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3363 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Zend_XmlRpc in Zend Framework 1.x before 1.11.12 and 1.12.x before 1.12.0 does not properly handle SimpleXMLElement classes, which allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files or create TCP connections via an external entity reference in a DOCTYPE element in an XML-RPC request, aka an XML external entity (XXE) injection attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3363` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzend-framework-php - 1.12.20+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zend-framework - 1.12.20+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zend-framework-bin - 1.12.20+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zendframework - 1.12.20+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zendframework-bin - 1.12.20+dfsg-1ubuntu1
zendframework-resources - 1.12.20+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zendframework package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.20+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
